name: Judicial Annex Building
description: Government building housing various court-related services and offices in Laurel County. Serves as an annex facility for the Laurel County court system, providing additional space for judicial proceedings, administrative offices, and community meetings. Also hosts support group meetings including Narcotics Anonymous.
source: Verified from multiple authoritative sources including government websites and court directories
hours_of_operation: Monday - Friday 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM (government office hours)
eligibility: Open to public for court-related services
notes: Government building serving Laurel County court system. Hosts various court-related services and community meetings. Part of the broader Laurel County judicial infrastructure including the main courthouse and judicial center.
